text:
Special polio vaccinations camps will be held across Kanyakumari district on January 17 and February 21. Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan reviewed the preparatory works for the same at the Collectorate recently.

Arrangements were in place to vaccinate 1.47-lakh children below the age of 5 years. As many as 5024 employees would be involved in 1256 camps, Mr. Chavan said.
title: Polio vaccination camps
